name: Wienerberger AG
membership: TBE (Tiles and Bricks Europe), Cerame Unie, CPE (Construction Products Europe)
goal: Wienerberger is the world's largest producer of bricks and No. 1 on the clay roof tiles market in Europe with 198 production sites in 30 countries. We also hold leading positions in concrete pavers in CEE and pipe systems in Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Climate change, energy efficiency, renewable energy, Emissions Trading System, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Construction Products Regulation, Standardisation, Waste legislation, Industrial Emissions Directive, NEPSI, Research & Innovation.
